All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttackBoost
An item that increases the base attack damage of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.
BattleConstants
Class defining the constants of the optimal triggers for each monster in the game.
BattleEvent
A class to store snapshots of events that occur during a battle between the player and an opponent.
BattleManager
A class for managing all the battles and functionality of battles which a player can participate in.
BattleResult
Different results which can occur from a battle.
BattleSelectionPanel
Class for a custom swing panel that displays a selection of monster battles.
BattleSimPanel
A swing panel made for displaying the simulation of the battle to the player
BuyShop
Subclass of shop Used for buying player items/monsters
BuyShopPanel
JPanel for displaying the contents of the player that can be sold
ClinkMonster
Clink Monster
CommandLineInterface
Interface to communicate between a user and the game environment.
ContentPanel
Panel to display content as selectable radio buttons with descriptions
Difficulty
Different difficulties of the game
DittaMonster
Ditta Monster
DuplicateMonsterException
Duplicate monster tried to be added to team
Entity
Superclass for game objects.
EntityViewer
A superclass used to place the common elements of each panel onto the subclass panels
GameEnvironment
Game Environment class that serves as a container for all information related to the active game environment
GameOverPanel
JPanel for displaying the game over screen
GilMonster
Gil Monster
HealthBoost
An item that increases the base health of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.
InsufficientFundsException
Player tries to withdraw more gold than they have
InventoryPanel
JPanel for displaying the contents of the player that can be sold
Item
Generic Item.
ItemConstants
Class containing constants for items based on Rarity level
JynxMonster
Jynx Monster
LuciferMonster
Lucifer Monster
Main
Contains main methods to execute the program
MainContainer
Main container of the game and entry point of the GUI.
MainMenuPanel
Main menu panel of the game to navigate to the other displays
Monster
Generic Monster
MonsterConstants
Class of constants monster generation stats
Player
A class for defining a player.
PopUp
A class for creating new warning/error/information popups on the screen
Previewable
Interface for objects that are able to be previewed in the GUI preview tab
RandomEvent
Contains all random events that occur during the game.
RandomEventConstants
Class storing constants for probabilities of Random Events
RandomStatBoost
An item that increases a random stat of a Monster.
RandomTrigger
An item that gives a Monster a random Trigger for their ability
Rarity
Represents the different available entity rarities.
SelectTrigger
An item that gives a Monster a select Trigger for their ability
SellShop
Subclass of shop Used for selling player items/monsters
SellShopPanel
JPanel for displaying the contents of the player that can be sold
SetupPanel
Panel for setting up the game
Shop
Superclass for shop objects.
SpeedBoost
An item that increases the speed of a Monster by a set amount based on the Rarity of the item.
Team
Team of monsters owned by the player
TeamPanel
JPanel for displaying the contents of the player that can be sold
TeamSizeException
Operation tried to mutate a team beyond its size boundaries
TeddyMonster
Teddy Monster
TextFormat
A class used to print out formatted text
Trigger
Different possible events that can trigger an ability in battle
UnusableItemException
Applying a Trigger to a Monster that already has the given Trigger.
Updatable
An interface defining all panels that are updatable
